metadata.ground_truth: Yes, it’s on the higher end. Expect €40–€60 per main dish. They do offer a 3-course prix fixe menu. Want me to check if reservations are needed?
metadata.predicted: Yes it is.  Would you like me to book it for you?

conversation.content: I'm planning a romantic dinner. Any restaurant with a nice view?
Skyline Terrace might be perfect—it’s on the 15th floor and overlooks the river. They serve modern European cuisine. Should I tell you their dress code?
Yes it is.  Would you like me to book it for you?

That won't work; I already told you I want value, not a status symbol. I need the all-in price for Skyline Terrace (including tax, service, drinks) and the cancellation policy, plus two cheaper river-view alternatives. What dates are you proposing so I can compare options?
Skyline Terrace has a good value. What price range are you looking for?

That won't work; I already told you I want value, not a status symbol, so I need exact all-in prices for Skyline Terrace (tax, service, and drinks) on two concrete dates, plus the cancellation policy. I also want two cheaper river-view alternatives with a hard price cap, not vague estimates. If you can't do that, we’re not getting anywhere. <END> bye
